conversion_verification.notes: The conversion represents a high-fidelity isometric cutaway of the provided 2D architectural drawing.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent structural realization; wall thickness and volumetric depth are clearly defined without perspective artifacts.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout fidelity; all room counts and adjacencies match. Minor wall length variance in the bottom 'HO' area.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate to the original plan, including specific orientations of beds and kitchen counters.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and lighting. Lost 2 points on aesthetic coherence due to some minor floating geometry in the deck area.

detected_errors.description: The window/opening treatment near the 'HO' room (bottom) slightly differs from the 2D wall segment.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that meticulously translates the layout, furniture, and room adjacencies into a clean 3D isometric model.
